title: UK Pension Funds Eye Stake in Brookfield’s Center Parcs: Sky
description: Some of the UK’s biggest public sector pension funds are in talks to acquire a stake in holiday parks group Center Parcs, Sky News reported.
content: Some of the UK’s biggest public sector pension funds are in talks to acquire a stake in holiday parks group Center Parcs, Sky News reported.
